It looks as though [c][DF1FB2FF]today's assignments[-][/c],
as well as various [c][DF1FB2FF]commissions[-][/c] are posted here.

For now, it wouldn't hurt to take on some profitable commissions.
See, the pay isn't bad!

Take side quests or commissions, or today's assignments, if you want to
earn some extra pocket money or if you want to help those in need.
We've accepted the main quest Chapter 1 Explore Albus.

Albus is the name of the region where the Academy is located,
so we can get it done just by leaving the Academy.

Seeing as we're heading out anyway,
we might as well take this [c][DF1FB2FF]commission[-][/c] while we're at it!
It looks like we can accept [c][DF1FB2FF]commissions[-][/c] here.
